pages.name: Zero Damashii
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#zero_specter_ghost_eyecon)Zero Specter Ghost Eyecon$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Zero Specter
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ghost: The 100 Eyecons and Ghost's Fateful Moment (2016, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ghost/devices/zero_specter_driver)Ghost Driver (Zero Specter)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Ghost Driver or Mega Ulorder user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Strength V
